department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Introduction to Computer Science II
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 1-2:30, and an additional 90-minute section to be arranged
course.description: Abstraction and design in computation. Topics include functional and object-oriented styles of programming, software engineering in the small, and models of computation. Our main goal is to understand how to design large programs to make them readable, maintainable, elegant, and efficient. Exercises in OCaml.
